snippet.title: The First Official Genesis Game in 21 Years | Darius Sega Genesis Mini / MegaDrive Mini Review
snippet.description:
Today I take a look at the Megadrive / Genesis port of Darius and compare it with the PC-Engine / TurboGrafx-16 version as well as the recently released Darius Cozmic Arcade Collection on the Nintendo Switch and PS4

Support me on Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/St1ka
